medical_history.history_of_present_illness: The patient experienced sharp suprapubic pain at approximately 2:30 AM the day prior to admission, awaking her from sleep. The pain radiated to the RLQ and was associated with multiple episodes of nonbloody, nonbilious emesis. Symptoms persisted for 36 hours, leading the patient to seek emergency medical attention when they failed to resolve.
medical_history.past_medical_history: Endometriosis; ovarian cysts; nephrolithiasis (___ years ago); previous D&C
medical_history.social_history: Patient has a prescription for Percocet 5mg PRN since a previous car accident.
